TopicTitle: Fairing Plus - Toggle the over-head fairing spread!

Articles.Content:
Hello, Avera9eJoe here. I suggest for someone to make a plugin which allows users to toggle the fairing spread that occurs when hovering over/near fairings in editor. Now this might sound silly but keep reading. Currently if you want to see what the fairing looks like, you need to zoom out to the point that details are lost completely, and move your mouse to the far corner of the screen (meaning you cannot edit the surrounding parts).

It seems as though there isn't a mod that does this yet and I'm sure many builders would find this option very, *very* useful when trying to perfect fairing shape, match parts to fairings, build engine nacelles, build nosecones, fuselages, and all the other ingenious things people do with fairings.

![w788YxB.png](http://i.imgur.com/w788YxB.png)

On the more serious note though, *please* someone make this a thing. I have little doubt it would become an important tool to builders.

- Avera9eJoe

EDIT: I would even be happy for a plugin that just plain removed the spread. It would be more useful in my honest opinion.
